DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age < 39 year , Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 29 kg/m2 , Presence ovary , FSH level < 10 IU/l . Exclusion criterion : Endometriomas , Polycystic ovarian syndrome .
